text: Wilfried (Wilfried Scheutz; 24 June 1950 - 16 July 2017) was an Austrian singer-songwriter and actor. He was born in Bad Goisern am Hallstättersee, Austria. He was known for representing Austria in the 1988 Eurovision Song Contest with his song "Lisa Mona Lisa". He was also an actor with his best known role was in Hilde, das Dienstmädchen (1986). Wilfried died in Lilienfeld, Austria on 16 July 2017 from complications of esophageal cancer at the age of 67.MUERE WILFRIED SCHEUTZ, REPRESENTANTE AUSTRIACO EN EUROVISIÓN 1988. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1950 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Eurovision Song Contest entrants Category:Austrian singer- songwriters Category:Austrian movie actors
title: Wilfried (singer)
